类 org.cyy.fw.android.dborm.SQLObject
的使用

  • 使用SQLObject的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.cyy.fw.android.dborm  
    org.cyy.fw.android.dborm.sqlite
    Provide the SQLite ORM scheme and DB Access API, Expose the SqliteDBFacade for users
    User need to extend it and do a few things more: (1).Name the DB, android will create the specified DB file in the databases folder of the application (2).Implement the configureORMClasses() method, configure all mapped POJO classes, the DB will create tables according to this configured classes

    • org.cyy.fw.android.dborm中SQLObject的使用

      static SQLObject[] SQLObject.createSqls(java.util.List<java.lang.String> sqls)

      返回SQLObject的org.cyy.fw.android.dborm.sqlite中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Generate the insert SQL for some specified tables
      It will process relationship.
      SQLObject SqliteDBFacade.buildCreateSql(java.lang.Class<?> clazz, java.lang.String tableName)
      build create table SQL
      SQLObject SqliteDBFacade.buildDeleteSql(java.lang.Class<?> clazz, java.lang.Object condition)
      Generate delete SQL accordinging by condition described by POJO.
      SQLObject SqliteDBFacade.buildDeleteSql(java.lang.Class<?> clazz, java.lang.Object condition, java.lang.String tableName)
      Generate delete SQL of the specified table according by condition described by POJO.
      SQLObject[] SqliteDBFacade.buildInsertSql(java.lang.Object[] entities)
      Generate the insert SQL
      SQLObject[] SqliteDBFacade.buildInsertSql(java.lang.Object[] entities, java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<?>,java.lang.String> tableMap)
      Generate the insert SQL for some specified tables
      SQLObject SqliteDBFacade.buildUpdateSql(java.lang.Object newValue, java.lang.Object condition)
      Generate update SQL according by condition described by POJO.
      SQLObject SqliteDBFacade.buildUpdateSql(java.lang.Object newValue, java.lang.Object condition, java.lang.String tableName)
      Generate update SQL of the specified table according by condition described by POJO.
      SQLObject SqliteDBFacade.buildUpdateSql(java.lang.Object newValue, java.lang.Object condition, java.lang.String[] notIgnoreNullFields)
      Generate update SQL of the specified table according by condition described by POJO.

      参数类型为SQLObject的org.cyy.fw.android.dborm.sqlite中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void SqliteDBFacade.execSQL(SQLObject[] execSqls)
      Batch SQLs execution, may deal with some insertion, update, deletion in a single transaction, you should call the buildXXXSQL method for SQLObject parameter before call this method
      void SqliteDBFacade.execSQL(SQLObject[] execSqls, SQLiteDatabase db)
      Batch SQLs execution of a specified DB instance, may deal with some insertion, update, deletion in a single transaction, you should call the buildXXXSQL method for SQLObject parameter before call this method
